naryn 2.6.0.9000
  • Reference
  • User manual

Logical tracks

Creation and indexing

API:

emr_track.create would create a physical track and back it up with a logical track with the same name.

Implementation

We can use naryns existing mechanism for track and save it in a file similar to .naryn and .attrs (e.g. .logical_tracks). It has to be in the shared memory in order to be able to update it.

  • We would have to check that the track doesn’t already exist (as logical or physical), and that the physical track exists.
  • we would have to change emr_track.ls interface to return only the logical tracks.

When the system starts (emr_db.init) we would create virtual tracks for all the logical tracks. Those virtual tracks would not be visible when running emr_vtrack.ls.

The virtual tracks table of the logical tracks should also be in the shared memory and should be looked at when looking for virtual tracks in the code.

Track expression

We can create a function that would look for logical tracks and then would create virtual tracks and continue the call.

  • we need to remove the tracks after the function finishes.
  • make sure the keepref is OK (I tested and when keepref is true in emr_extract it overrides the fact that keepref was FALSE in the virtual track definition)

Iterator

We can create a new call where the iterator is the physical track and we add the value as a filter. If filters already exist - we add it with an ‘&’ gate.

  • we need to remove the filter when the function finishes

Virtual track

We can create a new virtual track with the source as the new source and add the vals parameter.

  • Problem: when running emr_vtrack.info the user would see different parameters than what he entered.

Filter

We can change src to the source and add the value to val.

  • Problem: when running emr_filter.info the user would see different parameters than what he entered.

Other functions

emr_track.ls() emr_track.exists() emr_track.info() emr_track.attr.* emr_track.var.*

We need to make sure not to allow creation of virtual tracks with the same name as logical tracks or logical tracks with the same name as virtual track. Also - when loading logical tracks from file we need to make sure there isn’t a virtual track with the same name.

emr_track.info/emr_track.attr

We should move the caching of all this data to R/python

emr_track.var

We should allow adding variables to logical tracks.
